title: Justin Bieber gets another vitamin drip... as wife Hailey goes incognito beneath a baseball cap
text:
Last month, they promised til' death do them part.

But on Wednesday, Justin Bieber and wife Hailey Bieber showed they weren't taking the vow too literally, with the couple spotted running separate errands in different parts of Los Angeles.

Justin, 25, was spotted with an IV drip in his arm in Beverly Hills, with the musician grabbing his regular vitamin boost.

Pepped up: Justin, 25, was spotted with an IV drip in his arm in Beverly Hills, with the musician grabbing his regular vitamin boost

The Baby hitmaker went casual for the medical appointment, slipping into fluoro yellow shorts and a white T-shirt.

A baseball cap sat askew on the pop star's head.

Meanwhile, across town his blushing bride covered her blonde tresses with a red baseball cap, tilted low so as to shield the 22-year-old model's face.

Hailey wore the accessory with cream-colored pants, a Cornell University sweatshirt and an oversized blazer.

Style: The Baby hitmaker went casual for the medical appointment, slipping into fluoro yellow shorts and a white T-shirt

Secret agent (wo)man: Meanwhile, across town his blushing bride covered her blonde tresses with a red baseball cap, tilted low so as to shield the 22-year-old model's face

Red-dy for it: The blonde beauty matched her firetruck red cap with a pair of bright red heels

The blonde beauty matched her firetruck red cap with a pair of bright red heels.

From her lobes hung a pair of heavy gold hoop earrings and in her right hand she carried a small handbag.

The twin outings come just days after the A-list couple shared their wedding pictures with the world, after their official ceremony in South Carolina on September 30.
description: On Wednesday, Justin Bieber and wife Hailey Bieber showed they weren't taking the vow too literally, with the couple spotted running separate errands in different parts of Los Angeles.
